error_header.en: Error during the Mobile ID login

descr_105.en: Mobile ID has not been ordered for this subscriber number. Please visit the Mobile ID Portal of your Mobile Network Operator.

descr_208.en: The transaction has timed out. Please try again.

descr_209.en: The service could not contact the enduser mobile device (bad connection, screen locked...). Please try again.

descr_401.en: The request has been canceled by the user.

descr_402.en: The Mobile ID PIN is blocked. Please visit #URL# to reset your PIN.

descr_403.en: The Mobile ID is suspended. Please visit #URL# to reactivate your Mobile ID.

descr_404.en: The subscriber number is not yet activated for Mobile ID. Please visit #URL# to activate your Mobile ID.

descr_406.en: Error on the enduser mobile device, probably an other signature request is already in progress. Please try again.

descr_422.en: The Mobile ID is no more active. Please visit #URL# to reactivate your Mobile ID.

descr_501.en: Verification error with the confirmation. Please try again and if the error persist contact your Mobile Network Operator.

descr_503.en: Verification error with the confirmation. Please try again and if the error persist contact your Mobile Network Operator.

descr_DEFAULT.en: Mobile ID can not be used at this time. Please try it again later.

descr_.en: Mobile ID can not be used at this time. Please try it again later.
